name: Piltover
desc: Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a player combat, the T-Hex gains Charges. Winning converts the Charges to Power for the T-Hex. You may also sell the T-Hex if it has any Power, resetting the T-Hex and converting its Power to loot.

levels.desc: Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.
